Name: Space Survival
About the game: Story Background: On this day, the era of the Great Escape has begun as human beings have exposed the coordinates of the earth in the universe. Human elites need to fly their spaceships to find a new home. Enough wisdom and courage are needed in this unknown universe. For the continuation of civilization and the future of mankind, you need to use your wisdom to rationally use all resources to survive. Features: New gameplay, tower defense + survival + strategy Relaxed and casual, strategy based A variety of props will give you unexpected surprises Events are triggered randomly, and each game is a different experience How to play: Execute Strategy by Days: Move on to the next day after completing your decisions for the day. Every day decisions are critical. Live Longer: Use the resources you have and your building wisdom wisely. Build Food: Keep food plentiful. Build weapons: Destroy invading enemies. Merchant Trade: In exchange for gold and any possible supplies. Mining resources: Different resources build different props, you must think clearly. Keeping pets: if you will.
